name: SharpBible
short_description: SharpBible is an attempt to create an API (similar to the Sword Project) and UI which supports multiple canons of scripture, allowing Jewish, Mormon, Oriental Orthodox, Catholic, Protestant, and all users to work with their familiar and complete bible.
